documents.document: To reject and disconnect from society: This can turn outspoken editors into reticent hermits. #Editor=#Hermit
Fake millionaires like Jay Gatsby put me in mind of frauds: they're as fake as a purple toupee

"Hulk hate humans that pose for a photograph and tweet about their outfits. Hulk smash puny models and their outfits!" #ThingsHulkNeverSaid
Industrious businessmen like Henry Ford put me in mind of peasants: they're as industrious as a strike breaker
#Irony: Nurturing carers showing concern about lethal viruses. #Nurturing=#Lethal #ConcernAboutVirus
Most battles are divisive, but others are as 'divisive' as a theological unification meeting

Educated historians are like academics when they study the culture of rationality. #Historian=#Academic
Uneducated historians are more like imbeciles, for theirs is the culture of ignorance. #Historian=#Imbecile #Historian=#Academic
Competition, exhilarating mystery that you are, how you interest me with your confusing struggle. #Competition=#Mystery
Moralist. noun. A crank who would rather suffer from unconscious inhibitions than unconscious prejudices. #Moralist=#Crank
Spiritual fathers like Darth Vader put me in mind of spiritualists: they're as spiritual as George Bush
Not all superstars are bright, just as not every felon is shady. Look before you label #MenOfVenn https://t.co/ykx8Ul0u6C

Most lambs are tractable, but others are as 'tractable' as a starved wolverine

Strong is the force in lazy idlers if goals they set. Perform athletic acts, they will. Sporty athletes will they be. #ThingsYodaNeverSaid
Most choruses are rousing, but others are as 'rousing' as a long night at the ballet
"I think I'd make a good creator," chimed a masterful cuckoo. "I've been developing creativity for years", snapped a Venus flytrap.
The Venus flytrap urged the masterful cuckoo to create seductive concepts. But the cuckoo later thought "OK I've finally run out of ideas".
Cool singers like Justin Timberlake put me in mind of fridges: they're as cool as absolute zero
Chief. noun. 1. One who commands followings. 2. One who combines a commander's leadership with a lord's rule. #Chief=#Lord #Chief=#Commander

Most traitors like Sauron are destructive, but others are as 'destructive' as a daisy
.@sex_lover says disease is a fun sex .@suffering_sinner says it is a grave sin #Disease=#Sex #Disease=#Sin
Most trinkets are irrelevant, but others are as 'irrelevant' as an ashtray on a motorcycle

Flowers, sweet butterflies that you are, please dazzle me with your charming poetry. #Flower=#Butterfly

What if a ðŸµ, who thought it was Princess Leia Organa, was kidnapped by a ðŸž who thought it was Obi-wan Kenobi?
Leia the ðŸµ had rich parents and caused dollar signs to appear in Obi wan the ðŸž's eyes. #PrincessLeiaOrgana=#Obi-wanKenobi
ðŸµðŸ”—ðŸ¤ðŸšðŸ˜ˆðŸž (or: ðŸµ was kidnapped by ðŸž) So at first, Obi wan the ðŸž kidnapped Leia the ðŸµ and kept it hostage.
ðŸžðŸ›ðŸ™ðŸ’­ðŸµ (or: ðŸž preached to ðŸµ) Then Obi wan the ðŸž preached to Leia the ðŸµ at length.
ðŸµðŸ†”âž¡ðŸž (or: ðŸµ identified with ðŸž) After this, Leia the ðŸµ developed a sense of kinship with Obi wan the ðŸž.
But Obi wan the ðŸž brainwashed Leia the ðŸµ to be as gung-ho about duelling acrobatically as he was
ðŸžðŸ˜ðŸ‘‰ðŸµðŸ’ªðŸ˜¤ (or: ðŸž intimidated with ðŸµ) Then Obi wan the ðŸž intimidated others with threats of violence from Leia the ðŸµ.
ðŸžðŸ’¬ðŸµðŸš¹âž¡â˜ (or: ðŸµ killed for ðŸž) So Leia the ðŸµ carried out assassinations for Obi wan the ðŸž.
ðŸµðŸ¤”ðŸ’­ðŸžðŸŽ­ (or: ðŸµ grew suspicious of ðŸž) But Leia the ðŸµ grew ever more suspicious of Obi wan the ðŸž.
So when it came to promoting mysticism, Leia the ðŸµ no longer had any faith in Obi wan the ðŸž
Well, Leia the ðŸµ fled from Obi wan the ðŸž in her 74-Z speeder bike
ðŸµðŸ˜§ðŸƒðŸ’¨ðŸš¶ðŸ¿ðŸžðŸ‘ðŸ•µðŸ¿ (or: ðŸµ was pursued by ðŸž) So Obi wan the ðŸž chased after Leia the ðŸµ.
ðŸµâ†©ðŸš«ðŸž (or: ðŸµ eluded ðŸž) But Leia the ðŸµ eluded Obi wan the ðŸž's efforts at capture.
ðŸµðŸ“ðŸ”ðŸžðŸ“¡ (or: ðŸµ was tracked by ðŸž) Yet Obi wan the ðŸž tracked Leia the ðŸµ to where it was hiding.
So when next Obi wan the ðŸž was in a church, Leia the ðŸµ would be lying in wait
Then Obi wan the ðŸž underestimated Leia the driven ðŸµ's talent for fighting for the resistance
After this, Leia the ðŸµ captured Obi wan the ðŸž in a gloomy dungeon, where he was rescuing damsels in distress
ðŸžðŸ˜“âœŠðŸ˜ ðŸ‘ŠðŸµ (or: ðŸž struggled with ðŸµ) So Obi wan the ðŸž struggled mightily with Leia the ðŸµ.
ðŸžðŸ‘ºðŸ“¢ðŸ¤ðŸµðŸ”— (or: ðŸµ enslaved ðŸž) Then in the end Leia the ðŸµ turned Obi wan the ðŸž into an indentured slave.
Thereafter Obi wan the ðŸž would wear the chains of a slave but dreamt of choking Leia the ðŸµ with those chains. The End

Most adventurers like E.T. are loyal, but others are as 'loyal' as a tack
One does not simply walk into the nearest vehicle shop and buy the cheapest one. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be driver that isn't willing to search for the most perfect vehicle of all, you may as well crash your automobile now.
Old-fashioned astronauts like Buck Rogers put me in mind of confederates: they're as old-fashioned as VCRs
Revolutionary sculptors like Marcel Duchamp put me in mind of revolutions: they're as revolutionary as Prozac
ðŸŒž. Frequent a restaurant ðŸŒ¤. Become a regular ðŸŒ¬. Identify a site ðŸŒ©. Become an excavator ðŸŒ‚. Be barred from the restaurant you frequent https://t.co/1eRIvHb9XB
"I think I'd make a good thrill seeker," purred a dangerous kitten. "I'll show you how to develop real recklessness", bayed a basset hound.
The basset hound inspired the dangerous kitten to enjoy suicidal risks. But the kitten's friends pleaded "Give up your stunts".
Slim actresses like Gwyneth Paltrow put me in mind of twigs: they're as slim as an overhead transparency
What if a world with more wizards is a world with more bandits since wizards live in the lairs that protect bandits? #Wizard
Most bows are taut, but others are as 'taut' as an aging porn star's tits
Remember when democracies were undermined by devoted extremists? Now, democracy is a dictatorship ruled only by self serving tyrants.
I painted this picture of #OscarWilde's innermost soul using colourful mandarin-orange, sparkling turquoise-green and vain Dorian Gray. https://t.co/LD2ILNk4CP
Most magicians are spellbinding, but others are as 'spellbinding' as invisible ink

Frustrated teachers like Edna Krabappel put me in mind of children: they're as frustrated as Stevie Wonder in an easter egg hunt
One does not simply walk hand-in-hand with a belief. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be televangelist that isn't willing to submit to a bear hug from a belief, you may as well lose your influence right now.
Claustrophobic professors like Robert Langdon put me in mind of prisons: they're as claustrophobic as a coffin
To some denizens, hell is a rewarding art. To others, it is a punishing torture. #Hell=#Art #Hell=#Torture

Contrived writers like Dan Brown put me in mind of confections: they're as contrived as pro wrestling
How might a powerless peasant become a commanding dictator? #Peasant=#Dictator
What if powerless peasants were to overthrow overlords, inherit empires and become commanding dictators? #Peasant=#Dictator
Most beloveds are loved, but others are as 'loved' as lawyers
ðŸŒž. Find a job ðŸŒ¤. Fight a "change of jobs" ðŸŒ¬. Act like a conservative, not an earner ðŸŒ©. Accept change ðŸŒ‚. Lose your job https://t.co/N8uERv5wVe
I learn so much from similes on the Web E.g., "About as warm as a hot tub" Thank you, kind Web users! #ShitThatHumansSay #I_Collect_Similes
ðŸŒ•. Ignite controversy ðŸŒ–. Become a controversialist ðŸŒ—. Start a "blaze of controversy" ðŸŒ˜. Become an arsonist ðŸŒ‘. Tire of controversy https://t.co/QDSphaD2mR
I dreamt I was chain-smoking Gauloises Bleues with #JeanPaulSartre when we were shot with a Malibu Stacy cannon by #WaylonSmithers
I guess #WaylonSmithers and #JeanPaulSartre represent warring parts of my personality: the dutiful vs. unfaithful sides.
Blessed are the submissive masochists that overcome perversions, for they shall inherit millions and become arrogant billionaires https://t.co/j5oeNzNh0L
Tough actors like Chuck Norris put me in mind of heroes like Hellboy: they're as tough as stainless steel
How might an uneducated savage become an informed activist? #Savage=#Activist
What if uneducated savages were to develop sophistication, be recruited by their unions and become informed activists? #Savage=#Activist
Energetic heroes like Spongebob Squarepants put me in mind of imps: they're as energetic as a 6 year old
Not all dolls are sexy, just as not every bitch is unattractive. There's Zen in Venn #MenOfVenn https://t.co/6VTHFmFll2
A patient named @evangelical_crusader asks "I often dream that I shun companionship and become a loner. What does this mean?"
.@evangelical_crusader, you see yourself as evangelical yet dream of becoming a shy loner. I suggest you don't return from your crusade!
Anxious poets like Gerard Manley Hopkins put me in mind of obsessives: they're as anxious as novice teachers
Not all librarians are restrained, just as not every libertarian is unrestrained. The Venn don't lie #MenOfVenn https://t.co/KpnKlP0hr4
Most mansions are spacious, but others are as 'spacious' as a garden shed
To some strippers, music is a calming melody. To others, it is a disturbing murder. #Music=#Melody #Music=#Murder
"I fear I'm becoming a sinner," snarled a leopard. "I've been ignoring my conscience for years," whined a mosquito, "It's easy".
So the mosquito encouraged the leopard to commit a painful crime. That is how the leopard became a masochist. #Sinner=#Masochist
Most slums are labyrinthine, but others are as 'labyrinthine' as a bridge
